skills.title: Technical leadership & business impact
skills.description: Head of Technology with dual expertise: strategic management of multidisciplinary teams and technical specialization in scalable SaaS architectures. Led teams of up to 15+ developers in creating enterprise platforms for Mary Kay, Smart House and other clients, combining business vision with technical excellence.
